sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function ShippingAndDelivery() { return (
Shipping & Delivery Policy
{/*
  • Introduction
    This Shipping & Delivery Policy explains how Sanjeevani Foundation handles the shipping and delivery of any goods or materials associated with our services. By making a purchase or donation involving physical items through our website, you agree to these terms.
  • Shipping Information
    (a) Shipping Areas
    We currently offer shipping to [list countries or regions you ship to]. For any inquiries about shipping to other locations, please contact us at [info@sanjeevanifoundation.org].

    (b) Shipping Costs
    Shipping costs are calculated based on the delivery location and the size/weight of the package. The total shipping cost will be displayed at checkout before you complete your purchase or donation.
  • Delivery Timeframes
    (a) Processing Time
    Orders are processed within [number] business days of receipt. Processing times may vary depending on the availability of items and order volume.

    (b) Delivery Time
    Once an order is processed, the estimated delivery time is [number] to [number] business days, depending on your location. Delivery times may vary due to factors such as shipping carrier delays or unforeseen circumstances.
  • Tracking Your Order
    Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this number to track your shipment through [carrierâ€™s website] or contact us for assistance.
  • Issues with Delivery
    (a)Delays
    We are not responsible for delays caused by shipping carriers or unforeseen circumstances. If you experience a significant delay, please contact us for assistance.

    (b)Lost or Damaged Items
    If your order is lost or damaged during shipping, please contact us at [info@sanjeevanifoundation.org] within [number] days of receiving your order. We will work with the shipping carrier to resolve the issue and provide a resolution.
  • Returns and Exchanges
    (a) Returns
    Returns are generally not accepted for items purchased through our website. However, if there is a problem with your order or if you receive an incorrect item, please contact us within [number] days of receiving your order to discuss possible solutions.

    (b) Exchanges
    Exchanges may be considered on a case-by-case basis. Please contact us if you need to exchange an item.
*/}
Last updated on Aug 9th 2024 Shipping is not applicable for business.
) } export default ShippingAndDelivery
